headers.value: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=(), usb=(), magnetometer=(), gyroscope=(), accelerometer=()

default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; connect-src 'self' https://formspree.io; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self' https://formspree.io; upgrade-insecure-requests;
